description: Pauses or resumes image creation when the associated workflow runs a WaitForAction step.

parameters.name: stepExecutionId
parameters.description: Uniquely identifies the workflow step that sent the step action.

parameters.name: imageBuildVersionArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image build version to send action for.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action for the image creation process to take while a workflow WaitForAction step waits for an asynchronous action to complete.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier you provide to ensure idempotency of the request. For more information, see Ensuring idempotency in the Amazon EC2 API Reference. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: stepExecutionId
nested_items.description: The workflow step that sent the step action.

nested_items.name: imageBuildVersionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image build version that received the action request.

nested_items.name: clientToken
nested_items.description: The client token that uniquely identifies the request.
